title: Duplicate entries in `required`
description: The `required` array must contain unique property names. Duplicated values are redundant and can be removed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Duplicate names in required
comprehensiveExamples.description: `required` array must contain unique property names.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Unique required list
comprehensiveExamples.description: A deduplicated required array is valid.

message: Remove duplicate items from the `required` array.
